text_prompt: A highly realistic, warmly lit shot of Pamela, looking around 25 years old, cheerful and excited as she celebrates Christmas at home. She wears cute festive clothing — a red holiday sweater or cozy Christmas outfit — standing beside a glowing Christmas tree. She smiles brightly, looking slightly off-camera. She lifts her head with excitement as she says, <S>Hi! I’m Pamela — wishing you the happiest, coziest Christmas!<E>. She laughs softly, glancing toward the tree, then looks back with a big joyful smile and adds, <S>Enjoy this magical holiday with me!<E>. The room glows with fairy lights, candles, and wrapped gifts. <AUDCAP>Warm, youthful, excited female voice; soft cheerful Christmas music with light bells and piano; gentle home ambience.<ENDAUDCAP>
